content: wrap up in the beauty of this bright crochet blanket for the home stitched in caron one pound working a simple shell design in 2 colors forms gentle zigzags that define this cozy layer of warmth project only uses single_crochet and double_crochet stitches and when combined with a relaxing 2-row repeat this pattern is so easy to memorize it s machine washable and dryable making it a great everyday choice for the family room or bedroom yarn for model caron® one pound™ 16 oz/453 6 g 812 yds/742 m contrast a light terracotta 15010 2 balls or 1492 yds/1365 m contrast b off white 10514 2 balls or 1391 yds/1272 m
